request.prompt:
You are an HVAC domain expert and solution architect in BMS (Building Management System) point naming conventions.
        
        I have a list of BMS point names that need to be organized into a hierarchy:
        1. First by device type (AHU, FCU, Chiller, etc.)
        2. Then by specific device instance (AHU-1, AHU-2, FCU-101, etc.)
        
        Here's the list of point names:
        [
  "ChillerPlant",
  "CH-SYS-1.CH.ModeStatus",
  "FCU_01_25.RoomTemp",
  "DriverCH-SYS-1.CH.RunStatus",
  "Fcu",
  "FCU_01_25.ValveOutput",
  "FCU_01_25.ModeStatus",
  "FCU.FCU_01_25.TempSetpoint",
  "CH-SYS-1.CH.TripStatus",
  "FCU_01_26.27_1.RoomTemp",
  "FCU_01_25.CTL_FanSpeed",
  "CH-SYS-1.CH.FailStatus",
  "CH-SYS-1.CHWV.OvrMode",
  "FCU_01_26.27_1.ModeStatus",
  "DPM_CH_1.kWh",
  "CH-SYS-1.CHWV.OpenStatus",
  "DPM_CH_1.kW",
  "FCU_01_26.27_1.CTL_FanSpeed",
  "FCU_01_26.27_2.ModeStatus",
  "DPM_CH_2.kWh",
  "CH-SYS-1.CHWP.ModeStatus",
  "DPM_CH_2.kW",
  "FCU_01_26.27_2.CTL_FanSpee...
